msg: Ported XTags over to the new build system. Also moved the XSLT tags into org.apache.taglibs.xtags.xslt and moved XPath related tags into org.apache.taglibs.xtags.xpath.  Also removed dependency on log4j and added new tags for <add> <replace> and <remove> that were submitted by James Elson
